## Age Gap - Why millenials can't afford homes

One of the greatest challenges young people face on their way to home ownership is the widening gap between house prices and income.

The chart below explores the relationship between the average house price (Source: [Nationwide Building Society](https://www.nationwide.co.uk/about/house-price-index/download-data#xtab:uk-series)) and average real disposable income per capita (Source: [Office for National Statistics](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/grossdomesticproductgdp/timeseries/crxw/ukea)), in the United Kingdom, from 1955 to 2017.
